name: Skaint
description:
skate paint

WASD: skate

Left Mouse Button: paint

Right Mouse Button: tags

F: tags

E: back flip

Q: front flip

goals: leave your mark on the world

This is my team's first game jam!  All the assets are made by us.  Game created in Godot.  Mind the filetype when downloading.  There's a version for windows and a version for mac.

Team

Zynonia - Art, Level design

Coebalt - Art

Oxygen-ox - Art

tpw_rules - Programming, Debugging

Crawfeesh - Music
